ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Procambarus >7000 ug/l/96 hr @ 12 °C, early instar, static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material 87.2%/

LC50 Salmo clarki (Cutthroat trout) 5.3 ug/l/96 hr @ 10 °C, static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate andalkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. (95% Confidence Limit 4.2-6.8 ug/l), wt 0.6 g /Technical Material 87.2%/

LC50 Salmo gairdneri (Rainbow trout) 20 ug/l/96 hr @ 12 °C, static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. (95% Confidence Limit 12-32 ug/l), wt 1.0 g /Technical material 87.2%/

LC50 Salvelinus namaycush (Lake Trout) 30 ug/l/96 hr @ 12 °C, static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. (95% Confidence limit 21-43 ug/l), wt 2.2 g /Technical material 87.2%/

LC50 Pimephales promelas (Fathead minnow) >30,000 ug/l/96 hr @ 5 °C, wt 0.5 g, static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. /Technical material 87.2%/

LC50 Lepomis macrochirus (Bluegill) 22 ug/l/96 hr @ 5 °C, static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. (95% Confidence limit 14-35 ug/l), wt 1.4 g /Technical material 87.2%/

LC50 Salmo gairdneri (Rainbow trout) 35 ug/l/96 hr @ 12 °C, static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/l as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/l. (95% Confidence limit 29-42 ug/l), wt 0.6 g /Emulsifiable Concn 2.7%/
LC50 JAPANESE QUAIL ORAL APPROX 1500 PPM, AGE 14 DAYS
LC50 RING-NECKED PHEASANTS ORAL 1075 PPM (95% CONFIDENCE LIMIT 700-1746 PPM), AGE 10 DAYS
LC50 MALLARD DUCKS ORAL 1635 PPM (95% CONFIDENCE LIMIT 1279-2109 PPM), AGE 5 DAYS
LD50 Anas platyrhychos (Mallard) female oral 1,333 mg/kg (95% confidence limits 982-1,809 mg/kg), age 4 mo, sample purity = 90%
LD50 Colinus virginianus (Bobwhite) male oral 228 mg/kg (95% confidence limits 184-283 mg/kg), age 11 mo, sample purity = 90%
LD50 Callipepla californica (California quail) male oral 29.2 mg/kg (95% confidence limits 20.4-41.6 mg/kg), age 9-11 mo, sample purity = 90%
LD50 Pheasant male oral 62.8 mg/kg (95% confidence limits 15.9-248 mg/kg), age 3-4 mo, sample purity = 90%
LC50 Coturnix japonica (Japanese quail), 14 days old, oral (5-day ad libitum in diet) 2,645 ppm (95% confidence interval 2,270-3,081 ppm /Technical grade, 93% active ingredient/
